usage_guide.basic_usage: Templates can be applied by specifying the template name and color scheme
usage_guide.customization: All elements can be customized including positions, colors, fonts, and content
usage_guide.positioning: All positions are in inches from top-left corner of slide (10" x 7.5" standard)
usage_guide.color_roles: Use color_role to automatically apply colors from selected scheme
element_types: text - Text content with various formatting options
image - Pictures with positioning and styling
shape - Geometric shapes with fill and border options
table - Data tables with header and cell formatting
chart - Various chart types with data series
best_practices: Use consistent color schemes throughout presentation
Maintain proper text hierarchy with title/subtitle/body fonts
Leave adequate white space for readability
Ensure images are high resolution for professional appearance
Test layouts with actual content before finalizing

implementation_notes.mcp_integration: Templates designed to work with existing MCP server tools
implementation_notes.backward_compatibility: All templates use existing presentation capabilities
implementation_notes.extensibility: New templates can be added by following the same JSON structure
implementation_notes.automation: Templates can be automatically applied based on content type detection
